00038 /*
00039  * Message structure
00040  */
00041 typedef struct BX_MSG {
00042         HBOX              hbox;
00043         BX_UINT           message;
00044         BX_WPARAM         wParam;
00045         BX_LPARAM         lParam;
00046         BX_DWORD          time;
00047         BX_POINT          pt;
00048 } BX_MSG, *BX_PMSG;
00049 
00050 /*
00051 #define POINTSTOPOINT(pt, pts)                          \
00052         { (pt).x = (LONG)(SHORT)LOWORD(*(LONG*)&pts);   \
00053           (pt).y = (LONG)(SHORT)HIWORD(*(LONG*)&pts); }
00054 
00055 
00056 #define POINTTOPOINTS(pt)      (MAKELONG((short)((pt).x), (short)((pt).y)))
00057 */
00058 #define BX_MAKEWPARAM(l, h)      (BX_WPARAM)BX_MAKELONG(l, h)
00059 #define BX_MAKELPARAM(l, h)      (BX_LPARAM)BX_MAKELONG(l, h)
00060 #define BX_MAKELRESULT(l, h)     (BX_LRESULT)BX_MAKELONG(l, h)
00061

00533 typedef struct BX_CREATESTRUCTA {
00534 //    BX_PVOID      lpCreateParams;
00535 //    HAPP          hApp;
00536 //    HBOX          hboxParent;
00537 //    BX_INT         cy;
00538 //    BX_INT         cx;
00539 //    BX_INT         y;
00540 //    BX_INT         x;
00541 //    BX_LONG        style;
00542 //    BX_PSTRING      lpszName;
00543 //    BX_PSTRING      lpszClass;
00544 //    BX_DWORD       dwExStyle;
00545         BX_RECT m_Rect;
00546         BX_PSTRING m_Text;
00547         BX_LONG m_Style;
00548         BX_LONG m_Type;

00551 } BX_CREATESTRUCT, *BX_PCREATESTRUCT;

00566 typedef struct tagBOX_STRUCT
00567 {
00568   BX_WORD               ID;
00569   BX_RECT               rc;
00570   BX_WORD               type;
00571   BX_PSTRING    lpBoxStr;
00572   BX_DWORD              style;
00573   struct tagBOX_STRUCT          *bNext;
00574   struct tagBOX_STRUCT          *bParent;
00575   BX_INT   userLevel;
00576   BXPROC                boxProc;
00577   BXDLGPROC             dlgProc;
00578   BX_INT                MsgResult;
00579   PINSTANCE hInstance;
00580   PCLASS        hCls;
00581   BX_WORD               boxState;
00582   BxDC m_BxDC;
00583   BX_BOOL m_Dirty;
00584   HBOX m_oldFocus;
00585   HBOX m_oldActive;
00586   HBOX m_oldDlg;
00587   BX_PVOID m_image;
00588   BX_PVOID m_userData;
00589         BX_PVOID m_menuData;
00590 } BOXSTRUCT, *PBOXSTRUCT;
00591 
00592 BX_LRESULT DefBoxProc(
00593 
00594         HBOX  hBox,     // handle of box
00595         BX_UINT  uMsg,  // message identifier
